title: Syllabub
description: At a decrepit 33 princess Jane Dough is about to be married off to one of the undesirable princes from one of the neighboring kingdoms. The latest castle gossip has revealed that one is a murderer. There is only one solution; to take matters into her own hands and go off in search of the mythical Liberdade, where she will be free to be just who she is... no editing required. Sadly, Liberdade is not just around the corner and in order to get there she will need to traverse swamps; jungle; and encounter bandits; monsters; pygmies; and a dangerous Wizard while being pursued by four prospective husbands. The friends and adventures along the way may just turn out to be the most inspiring thing that has ever happened to Jane.
author: M. Meindertsma
